translations: v.涂以瓷釉；彩饰（enamel 的过去时和过去分词）

phrs.translation: 漆包, 上釉的, 漆包线, 漆包圆
漆皮, 涂漆皮, 皮革类英语
漆包线, 翻译, 漆包线鉝, 漆包
釉瓷玻璃, 彩饰玻璃, 釉面玻璃

sentences.sentence: An enamelled copperware artist at work in Esfahan.
sentences.translation: 伊斯法罕的艺术家在制作瓷漆铜制品。

sentences.sentence: She drew out a little gold-faced watch on an enamelled chain.
sentences.translation: 她取出一只金面小怀表，表上系着彩饰的表链。

sentences.sentence: His left hand, which rested on his enamelled sword hilt, was bandaged.
sentences.translation: 他那按在宝剑珐琅柄上的左手外面裹着绷带。
